title: When will Pixel 5 will be launched in India ?
content:
Pixel 4 was never launched in India.
I am an avid user of Google pixel, all coz of its benchmarking camera quality, unlimited photo backups and early updates.

Not much of a lag I face, many prompt services.. all smooth and nice.

Already 2 yrs gone, planned to buy a new phone and pixel 4 haven't yet launched although coz of its pros that helped to capture it's business, but seems like it was removed and had become it's cons. 
Eager about Pixel 5,
I hope there is some development or wondering, if it will ever get launched ? If Google has dropped out of the market probably I should look into buying something else.
Hoping to see pixel launch again successfully.
Please keep the updates on pixel 5 but plz don't do any leaks like you did with pixel 4&4xl.

Regards,
Roopa
